backend/main.mo: Implements user access control, profiles, and app‑password unlock sessions with permissions and session‑timeout checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, and core routes including protected pages behind UnlockGate.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and clearing query cache on logout.
Route guard enforcing login and unlock requirements, allowing admins to bypass unlock.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing copyright and caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic hostname tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper providing nav, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing branding and navigation links when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/settings/AppPass: UI panel for changing, resetting, and locking the app password using dialogs and hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppPassword.ts: Provides functions to unlock and save the app password by hashing input and calling backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppPasswordManagem: Combines unlocking, saving, and actor logout to implement change, reset, and lock password flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller’s role or admin status from the backend with identity-aware caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, and stored identities via an auth client provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlockStatus.ts: Queries whether the current user session is unlocked and tracks loading state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/backendCallWithUnlock.t: Wraps backend calls to detect locked errors and redirect to the unlock page while preserving return location.
frontend/src/lib/lockedError.ts: Utility to detect backend errors indicating a locked account.
frontend/src/lib/returnToContext.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears a return path in sessionStorage for post-unlock navigation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity auth and redirecting users based on admin role, with a marketing-style UI and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Projects dashboard showing an empty state, project creation button, and basic getting-started cards.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page displaying user profile info, app password panel, and an about section for the app.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Account unlock page managing password creation, authentication, and redirects based on admin and unlock status.
frontend/src/security/hashAppPassword.ts: Implements PBKDF2 hashing of app passwords using WebCrypto and returns a hex-encoded hash.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across routing and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theme colors, fonts, containers, and animations for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the current Thunderlab project state, including schema version, product summary, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features with IDs and metadata.
